text: Zoltán Horváth (born 1 November 1954) is a Hungarian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Hungary Category:Equestrians at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:People from Sárvár
title: Zoltán Horváth (equestrian)
